channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Senate Democrats walk out of committee vote to advance Trump court pick Emil Bove
Experts issue warning on ocean phenomenon that could impact hurricane season: 'It's been notable over the month'
Russian banks prepare for bailouts as Putin’s war hammers economy
5 Best Passive Income Ideas From Mark Cuban That You Would Be a Fool To Ignore
Israel bombs Gaza’s only Catholic church
Judge OKs release plan for woman who stabbed a classmate to please Slender Man
item.description: A Wisconsin judge has approved the conditional release of Morgan Geyser, who as a child nearly stabbed a classmate to death to please the fictional ho...

item.title: Daunted by geopolitics and trade war, US companies in China report record-low new investment plans
item.description: American companies in China are reporting record-low investment plans and declining confidence in profits this year

item.title: Just 1 in 4 US adults say Trump's policies have helped them, a new AP-NORC poll finds
item.description: Just 1 in 4 U.S. adults say President Donald Trump’s policies have helped them

item.title: Border Patrol hiring spree offers lessons as another immigration agency embarks on massive growth
item.description: Immigration and Customs Enforcement plans to hire 10,000 employees over five years, echoing a Border Patrol expansion in the 2000s

item.title: 1 dead, 13 hurt in lightning strike at New Jersey archery range, police say
item.description: Police say a lightning strike at an archery range in New Jersey killed a man and injured 13 others
